creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: book of woodblock prints, 18 double pages; landscape scenes in the Chinese manner; same illustrations extend across both pages
markings:
42 seals(of poets) throughout
the first page:Album of \"Mountains in my Heart\" illustrated and calligraphed by Bo_sai; owned by Suyama book store
(Bo_sai sensei shofu, Kyo_chu_san; Suyama shobo_ zo_)
the next two pages:poem by Bo_sai
three pages after prints:explanation on how this book was made
the last page:
Bunka 6, 5 month
Publisher:Suharaya Shinbei
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and limited color on paper
provenance: Mr. Takhana (') in Nagano prefecture; Mitchell Hutchinson; Joan B. Mirviss Ltd. (until 1998)
title: Mountains in My Heart
